definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: The weather became so bad that they had to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 天氣變得很壞，他們只好原路而歸了。

sentences.english: If you don't like the weather at front window, see the weather at back window. (
sentences.chinese: 如果你不喜歡前窗的天氣，不妨看看後窗的。

sentences.english: Oh dear, I'd been looking forward to warmer weather here.
sentences.chinese: 噢天啊，我原期望這兒會有較暖和的天氣。

sentences.english: At what point does the RO decide to abandon in deteriorating weather conditions?
sentences.chinese: 天氣惡化時，裁判長在什麼時刻決定放棄競賽？

sentences.english: Thellord, the weather and almost southern Chellona.
sentences.chinese: 第三，天氣也與我國南邊差不離。

sentences.english: When it drizzles in summer, hiking can be pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天下毛毛雨的天氣裏，徒步旅行甚是愜意。

sentences.english: If there is a thunderstorm at the target airport, the flight can land to alternate airport .
sentences.chinese: 如果該機場爲雷雨天氣，飛機可以到備降機場降落。

sentences.english: It's very hot, sa the horseman decides to give the horses a bath.
sentences.chinese: 天氣非常熱，所以養馬人決定給馬兒們洗個澡。

sentences.english: Natasha's voice rang out in the frost -bound air.
sentences.chinese: 在冰凍天氣的冷空氣中傳來娜塔莎的說話聲。

sentences.english: The warning is based on the latest 5-day weather forecasts.
sentences.chinese: 這項警報是以今後5天的天氣預報資料爲基礎的。

sentences.english: When it is cloudy, i am cold, impuissant and sad.
sentences.chinese: 只要天氣陰暗，我就會非常的冷漠，無奈，甚至悲傷。

sentences.english: Whether we will go picnicking tomorrow depends on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 明天我們是否去野餐取決於天氣好壞。

sentences.english: The rainy weather, xue antai killed in the car watching Ceng Nianan and hands.
sentences.chinese: 天氣下着雨，薛安泰在車裏看着曾念安和手下撕殺。

sentences.english: South Africa Has Beautiful Scenery, Mild Climate , "Rainbow Country"Good Name.
sentences.chinese: 南非風景娟秀，天氣溫順，有“彩虹之國”的美稱。

sentences.english: So, newscaster, what's the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 那和，新聞播音員，今天天氣怎麼樣？

sentences.english: It was a clear, sunny day. The weather was beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 這天風和日麗，天氣真好。

definition: to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
